name: 3E IT Solutions
description:
3E IT Solutions is a global product development company with a strong focus on emerging technologies. In the past 10 years, 3E has worked with 100+ organizations ranging from startups to mid-level and fortune 500 enterprises, for product development and digital transformation in the areas of Business Solutions, Healthcare, Retail, Real Estate, Automotive and Education.
3E's core strength lies in UI/UX design, On-Demand servcices, Mobility, Custom Software solutions, Cloud transformation, IOT and AR/VR experiences.
Backed by an experienced management team, domain knowledge and a talented resource pool, 3E prides itself on growing long term business relationships and reliably meeting deliveries with integrity and efficiency.
Key Offerings:
Product development - Native and hybrid mobile application development, Custom Sotware, Web development
Rapid Prototyping Services - POC / MVP development, UI/UX design
Ecommerce development 
Migration to Cloud
Enterprise Application Development and Integration
Staff Augmentation 
QA / Testing Services 
IoT Application Development - Smart homes, connected cars & devices
Augement / Virtual / Mixed Reality
